appetizers.name: Caprese Salad
appetizers.description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, juicy tomatoes, and fragrant basil drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Cocktail
appetizers.description: Succulent shrimps served with a zesty cocktail sauce and a wedge of lemon.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with fresh diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.
appetizers.image_author: Mike van den bos on unsplash

appetizers.name: Mushroom Soup
appetizers.description: A creamy soup made with fresh mushrooms, cream, and thyme.

dishes.name: Beef Wellington
dishes.description: A tender filet mignon wrapped in flaky puff pastry and served with a red wine reduction.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon
dishes.description: A juicy salmon fillet seasoned with lemon pepper and grilled to perfection. Served with a side of steamed vegetables.

dishes.name: Pesto Pasta
dishes.description: Fresh pasta tossed in a creamy pesto sauce with cherry tomatoes and parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: BBQ Ribs
dishes.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs smothered in a sweet and tangy BBQ sauce. Served with coleslaw and baked beans.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese topped with cocoa powder.

desserts.name: Chocolate Cake
desserts.description: Decadent chocolate cake with layers of chocolate mousse and a rich chocolate ganache.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy vanilla cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and your choice of raspberry or chocolate topping.

desserts.name: Crème Brûlée
desserts.description: Silky smooth vanilla custard with a caramelized sugar topping.
